answers.answer: Im actually in the lab now doing mine lol they didnt give me an option mine was orange. Same with my son 5 years ago... orange (: it's not bad tho trust me. Just think of it as kool-aid
How  far along are you guys? Just curious when to expect my testing
i have mine tomorrow! do you girls know if you're supposed to eat or not beforehand?
No eating and I got the lemon lime flavor.
I've been allowed to eat before with all 3 pregnancies for the one hour test so I'd check with your Dr. I was told that if I needed the 3 hour test I couldn't eat before that one.
i checked with my dr and they said i can eat a normal breakfast for my 1 hour. its the 3 hour they require me to not eat if i need to take it

When I did mine I was allowed to eat before but I ate a very small meal since I was scared of failin' It. I had the option to choose orange or fruit punch. I chose the fruit punch and I thought It tasted pretty good lol It tasted like a cheap Imitation brand of a fruit punch drink.

I had the orange with my other two, tastes like when my hubby makes koolaid cause he puts 10 pounds of sugar in it lol. It's not too bad though. You can eat like you usually would before the 1 hour, just not the 3
My doctor said that I could eat before mine but if I have to do the 3 hour one I couldn't eat !!
When do you get the results?
So what flavor did you decide on and how'd It go? =-]

question: I take my test later today can anyone give me a opinion on what flavor to pick these is my first time taking it an I rather drink the flavor that taste the best ??
title: gestational diabetes
